Text:
The other day we finally discovered a plot of land
that meets our criteria, so I've decided to proceed
with the development of a base there.
It will be about as big as...this.
I see.

(She's at it again. She really wants to build
another base the same size as the ancient castle
in Alexandria, huh?)

Alexandria is the perfect place for a base, and we
even have the Mist Dragon's blessing. But it's not
perfectly safe. There's always the possibility that
the Cult may launch an attack.

If we had one more...hidden base, in the event of
an attack we could regroup there. Of course,
we could also use it for other purposes.
Uh-huh...

(A hidden base, huh? Oh, Alpha, I know what you're
getting at. You're putting up a good front, but I
know what you really want to build.)
...A Shadow Base, right?

You've seen right through me.
Yes, that's the goal.

(Heh, I get it. I know exactly what she's thinking.
Alexandria is definitely a prime location. But...it's
way too fancy!)

(Of course, swirling a glass of wine in a luxurious
room while saying something profound is an essential
part of being a shadowbroker.)

(But as the name implies, a shadowbroker is someone
who lurks in the shadows. So it's only natural to
want a hidden base that's actually hidden!)

(Y'know, a fully functional secret base with clever
traps like that hideout that Claire was held hostage
in. That's what I want! Is that too much to ask?)

I'll oversee the development of the base and report
to you when it's finished—

Not so fast... I'll see to the base's development
myself.

Huh? But, the base has to be built from scratch.
I couldn't possibly make you waste your time...
Alpha.

(That look in his eyes! To think that he's taken such
an interest in our new base...)

(Don't think you'll get to do something as cool as
building a Shadow Base without me! I won't let you
hog all the fun, Alpha. You have to let me join in
for a change!)

...Alright then, I'll leave the planning to you this
time. Of course, we will give you our full support.
...Heehee
What's so funny?

Oh, I'm sorry, it's nothing. I didn't mean to laugh.
It's just that you're taking this so seriously.

(He always does things way ahead of us, but now he
wants to accomplish something together... Thank you,
Shadow.)

(I know, I know. A Shadow Base is everyone's dream.
If I let my guard down my excitement might show.)

Never mind that. Now that it's settled, let's get to
work. It's time to build our new base—
The "Secret Garden"!

"Secret Garden"...it has a nice ring to it. I'll tell
the other Seven Shadows right away.

(I'm sure the others will be glad to develop the base
with him too.)

(Heh heh... I can't wait to start! I'm gonna make a
special room and store all my collectibles there!)

(I can train and practice my shadowbroker skills
without worrying about being seen! Oh yeah, this just
keeps getting better and better!)

And so began Shadow and the Seven Shadows' plan to
develop the "Secret Garden."
